import{useEffect}from"react";/**
 * Applies a subtle vertical parallax transform to every element
 * with the class "parallax-slow" as the user scrolls.
 */const useParallax=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const handle=()=>{const y=window.scrollY;document.querySelectorAll(".parallax-slow").forEach(el=>{el.style.transform="translateY(".concat(y*0.12,"px)");});};window.addEventListener("scroll",handle,{passive:true});return()=>window.removeEventListener("scroll",handle);},[]);};export default useParallax;
